    Builder for a blockstate definition file (namespace:blockstates/blockid.json).

    • Method Detail

      • variant

        public BlockStateBuilder variant​(java.lang.String name,
                                 Processor<BlockStateBuilder.Variant> settings)
        Add a variant for the given state key. Calling this multiple times for the same key will modify the existing value. variant and multipart are incompatible; calling this will remove any existing multipart definitions.
        Parameters:
        name - The state key ("" for default or format: "prop1=value,prop2=value").
        settings - A callback which will be passed a BlockStateBuilder.Variant.
        Returns:
        this

      • weightedVariant

        public BlockStateBuilder weightedVariant​(java.lang.String name,
                                         Processor<BlockStateBuilder.Variant> settings)
        Add a variant for the given state key, with multiple weighted random options. Calling this multiple times for the same key will add to the list instead of overwriting. variant and multipart are incompatible; calling this will remove any existing multipart definitions.
        Parameters:
        name - The state key ("" for default or format: "prop1=value,prop2=value").
        settings - A callback which will be passed a BlockStateBuilder.Variant.
        Returns:
        this

      • multipartCase

        public BlockStateBuilder multipartCase​(Processor<BlockStateBuilder.Case> settings)
        Add a multipart case. Calling this multiple times will add to the list instead of overwriting. variant and multipart are incompatible; calling this will remove any existing variant definitions.
        Parameters:
        settings - A callback which will be passed a BlockStateBuilder.Case.
        Returns:
        this
